name: kol-pt
description: KOL Patreon Tracker is a Chromium extension and Edge addon that helps you track KingOfLightning (KOL) reactions on Patreon. KOL is an Anime/Manga YouTuber who mostly does One Piece content and other reactions and theories.

scripts.postinstall: npm run install:ext && npm run install:auth
scripts.clean: rm -rf build && npm run clean:ext && npm run clean:auth
scripts.start: npm run start:ext && npm run start:auth
scripts.build:ext: npm run clean && cd ./kol-pt-ext && npm run build && mkdir ../build && mv build ../build/ext
scripts.build:auth: npm run clean && cd ./kol-pt-auth && npm run build && mkdir ../build && mv build ../build/auth
scripts.build: npm run build:ext && npm run build:auth
